text:
I would like to request to add tool tip text. This is very useful to see the 
text, when the the contents are not fit in the tree node. 

I also created new class XMLDefaultMutableNode class to reduce size of 
ViewResultFullVisualizer.java

I have also attached the updated screenshot.

Dave
creator: dmaung1@yahoo.com
